name: QNX pkgsrc mirror
short_description:
Read-only mirror of QNX pkgsrc. Needed because people without super-fast and low-latency internet connections will need to use svn+ssh:// to avoid timeouts, as there are a whole lot of small files, and upstream doesn't support svn+ssh// access.

IMPORTANT: If you have svn 1.7 or later (svn --version), instead of starting with a svn checkout, download qnx-pkgsrc-svn-checkout-seed-r451.tar.bz2 and then follow the instructions in code/README-NOW.txt

Upstream: http://community.qnx.com/sf/projects/pkgsrc/

-->> USE THE svn+ssh:// PROTOCOL WHEN DOING A CHECK OUT OF THIS SVN REPOSITORY! <<--

Click on "Mailing Lists" above to join the new commit notification list.

If you need a git repo of this, it's super-easy to do an import of this repo from your github account. https://import.github.com/new (svn+ssh:// not needed)

You can check to make sure the mirror is up to date from here:
http://community.qnx.com/sf/scm/do/listRepositories/projects.pkgsrc/scm (then click pkgsrc)
